Lorenz.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !******************************************************************************
00002 ! Subroutine to Initialize, calculate the RHS, and calculate the Jacobian
00003 ! of the Lorenz problem 
00004 !******************************************************************************
00005 ! REQUIRED FILES:
00006 ! PRECISION_VARS.F90        *DEFINES PRECISION FOR ALL VARIABLES
00007 ! CONTROL_VARIABLES.F90     *CONTAINS VARIABLES AND ALLOCATION ROUTINES
00008 !******************************************************************************
00009       module Lorenz_mod
00010       private
00011       public :: Lorenz
00012       contains
00013       subroutine Lorenz(nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,rese_vec,resi_vec,akk)
00014       use precision_vars,    only: wp
00015       use control_variables, only: temporal_splitting,probname,xjac, &
00016      &                             tol,dt_error_tol,uvec,uexact,programstep
00017 
00018       implicit none; save
00019 !-----------------------VARIABLES----------------------------------------------
00020       integer, parameter     :: vecl=3
00021       real(wp), parameter    :: sigma=5.0_wp
00022       real(wp), parameter    :: beta=1.0_wp/3.0_wp
00023       real(wp), parameter    :: rho=2.0_wp
00024                  
00025       !INIT vars
00026       real(wp),        intent(in   ) :: ep
00027       real(wp),        intent(inout) :: dt
00028       integer,         intent(  out) :: nveclen
00029       real(wp),        intent(  out) :: tfinal
00030       integer,         intent(in   ) :: iDT
00031 
00032       real(wp), dimension(81,vecl+1) :: ExactTot
00033       real(wp)                       :: diff
00034       integer                        :: i
00035 
00036       !RHS vars
00037       real(wp), dimension(vecl), intent(  out) :: rese_vec,resi_vec
00038       
00039       !Jacob vars
00040       real(wp), intent(in   ) :: akk
00041 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00042       
00043       Program_Step_Select: select case(programstep)
00044         !**Pre-initialization. Get problem name and vector length**
00045         case('INITIALIZE_PROBLEM_INFORMATION')
00046           nvecLen = vecl
00047           probname='Lorenz   '         
00048           tol=1.0e-14_wp
00049           dt_error_tol=1.0e-11_wp
00050           
00051         !**Initialization of problem information**        
00052         case('SET_INITIAL_CONDITIONS')
00053       
00054           !Time information
00055           !dt = 0.25_wp*0.00001_wp/10**((iDT-1)/20.0_wp) !used for exact solution
00056           dt = 0.25_wp/10**((iDT-1)/20.0_wp) ! timestep 
00057           tfinal = 1.0_wp                    ! final time
00058 
00059           !**Exact Solution**
00060           open(unit=39,file='exact.lorenz.data')
00061           rewind(39)
00062           do i=1,81
00063             read(39,*)ExactTot(i,1),ExactTot(i,2),ExactTot(i,3)
00064             ExactTot(i,4) = 1.0_wp/10**((i-1)/(10.0_wp)) !  used for 81 values of ep
00065           enddo
00066           do i=1,81
00067             diff = abs(ExactTot(i,4) - ep)
00068             if(diff.le.1.0e-10_wp)then
00069               uexact(:) = ExactTot(i,:vecl)
00070               exit
00071             endif
00072           enddo
00073 
00074           !**IC**
00075           uvec(1) = 0.0_wp
00076           uvec(2) = 1.0_wp
00077           uvec(3) = 0.0_wp
00078         
00079         case('BUILD_RHS')
00080           choose_RHS_type: select case (Temporal_Splitting)
00081             case('EXPLICIT') ! For fully explicit schemes
00082               resI_vec(:)=0.0_wp
00083               resE_vec(1)=dt*sigma*(uvec(2)-uvec(1))/ep
00084               resE_vec(2)=dt*(-uvec(1)*uvec(3)+rho*uvec(1)-uvec(2))
00085               resE_vec(3)=dt*(uvec(1)*uvec(2)-beta*uvec(3))
00086             case('IMEX') ! For IMEX schemes
00087               rese_vec(1)=0.0_wp
00088               rese_vec(2)=dt*(-uvec(1)*uvec(3)+rho*uvec(1)-uvec(2))
00089               rese_vec(3)=dt*(uvec(1)*uvec(2)-beta*uvec(3))     
00090               resi_vec(1)=dt*sigma*(uvec(2)-uvec(1))/ep
00091               resi_vec(2)=0.0_wp
00092               resi_vec(3)=0.0_wp            
00093             case('IMPLICIT') ! For fully implicit schemes
00094               rese_vec(:)=0.0_wp
00095               resi_vec(1)=dt*sigma*(uvec(2)-uvec(1))/ep
00096               resi_vec(2)=dt*(-uvec(1)*uvec(3)+rho*uvec(1)-uvec(2))
00097               resi_vec(3)=dt*(uvec(1)*uvec(2)-beta*uvec(3))
00098           end select choose_RHS_type
00099           
00100         case('BUILD_JACOBIAN')          
00101           choose_Jac_type: select case (Temporal_Splitting)
00102             case('EXPLICIT') ! For fully implicit schemes
00103               xjac(1,1) = 1.0_wp
00104               xjac(1,2) = 0.0_wp
00105               xjac(1,3) = 0.0_wp
00106 
00107               xjac(2,1) = 0.0_wp
00108               xjac(2,2) = 1.0_wp
00109               xjac(2,3) = 0.0_wp
00110 
00111               xjac(3,1) = 0.0_wp
00112               xjac(3,2) = 0.0_wp
00113               xjac(3,3) = 1.0_wp
00114             case('IMEX') ! For IMEX schemes
00115               xjac(1,1) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(-sigma)/ep
00116               xjac(1,2) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(+sigma)/ep
00117               xjac(1,3) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(0.0_wp)/ep
00118 
00119               xjac(2,1) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(0.0_wp)
00120               xjac(2,2) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(0.0_wp)
00121               xjac(2,3) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(0.0_wp)
00122 
00123               xjac(3,1) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(0.0_wp)
00124               xjac(3,2) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(0.0_wp)
00125               xjac(3,3) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(0.0_wp)
00126             case('IMPLICIT') ! For fully implicit schemes
00127               xjac(1,1) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(-sigma)/ep
00128               xjac(1,2) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(+sigma)/ep
00129               xjac(1,3) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(0)/ep
00130 
00131               xjac(2,1) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(rho-uvec(3))
00132               xjac(2,2) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(-1.0_wp)
00133               xjac(2,3) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(-uvec(1))
00134 
00135               xjac(3,1) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(uvec(2))
00136               xjac(3,2) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(uvec(1))
00137               xjac(3,3) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(-beta)
00138           end select choose_Jac_type
00139           
00140       end select Program_Step_Select
00141       end subroutine Lorenz
00142       end module Lorenz_mod
Generated on 25 Jul 2016 for Doxygen Fortran Example by  1.6.1
